name: Search for recent tweets on Twitter
description:
The field Object ID is treated as search term. Simply add and select new nodes, login to Twitter and fetch data. You can search for hashtags (starting with #) and users (starting with @).

Gives back the 50 most recent tweets matching the query.

For formulating search terms (q-parameter) see https://dev.twitter.com/docs/using-search

For other parameters see https://dev.twitter.com/docs/api/1.1/get/search/tweets

For information on the returned data see https://dev.twitter.com/docs/platform-objects/tweets
